description.value:
Must make -10 Toughness Test after ingesting or suffer from Hallucinations (Roll on Hallucinogen Effects Table) for 1d10 rounds. Gives +20 to al Strength Tests and -10 to Perception Tests for 1d5 hours regardless of whether hallucinogenic effects occur. Afterwards, gain 1d5 fatigue.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
